alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Washington (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 2:27PM EST until January 16 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches, with higher amounts up to 6 inches on the higher hilltops. * WHERE...Washington and Allegany counties in Maryland and Morgan, Berkeley, and Jefferson counties in West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the afternoon and Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Washington
